scripts.lint-js: eslint -c .eslintrc app/ classic/ modern/ && eslint -c test/.eslintrc test/
scripts.test:watch: watch 'npm test' app/ classic/ modern/ test/
scripts.instrument-js: istanbul instrument app -o app_instrumented && istanbul instrument classic -o classic_instrumented
scripts.backup-js: mv app app_old && mv classic classic_old
scripts.restore-js: mv app_old app && mv classic_old classic
scripts.use-instrumented-js: mv app_instrumented app && mv classic_instrumented classic
scripts.un-use-instrumented-js: mv app app_instrumented && mv classic classic_instrumented
scripts.html-coverage: npm run rm-coverage-tmp-dirs && npm run rm-coverage && npm run instrument-js && npm run backup-js && npm run use-instrumented-js && istanbul cover npm run save-coverage && npm run un-use-instrumented-js && npm run restore-js && istanbul report --root ./coverage html && npm run rm-coverage-tmp-dirs
scripts.clean: npm run rm-coverage-tmp-dirs && npm run rm-coverage && rm -rf apidoc && rm -rf build/*
